snippet: A federal judge on Friday rejected a third request from lawyers for the man charged in the Boston Marathon bombings to move his trial outside Massachusetts.
abstract: Federal Judge George A O’Toole Jr rejects for third time defense lawyers' request to move Boston Marathon bombing trial outside Massachusetts.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge on Friday rejected a third request from lawyers for the man charged in the Boston Marathon bombings to move his trial outside Massachusetts.

headline.main: Massachusetts: Bid to Move Bombing Trial Is Rejected
headline.print_headline: Massachusetts: Bid to Move Bombing Trial Is Rejected
